fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: ~ Mockup (2-shot): Use in conjunction with your factional night attack. Choose a non-Agent role. If you successfully clean your target, their body will appear as the role of your choice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
~ Cleanup (Passive): If you use the factional night attack, you will clean your target, hiding their role and will. You will learn their role and the contents of their will.
~ Double Team (Passive): If any other Agents visit your attack target, you will know and deal a Powerful attack to the target instead.
